parts.text: Analyze the complexity of my workflow with ID 'workflow-123'

I'll analyze the complexity of workflow 'workflow-123' for you. Let me examine the workflow structure, node count, connections, and execution patterns to provide a comprehensive complexity assessment.
Find workflows similar to my data processing workflow
I'll search for workflows similar to your data processing workflow using semantic search. Let me analyze the workflow patterns and find similar workflows in your collection.
Analyze the performance of my workflow and identify bottlenecks
I'll analyze the performance of your workflow and identify potential bottlenecks. Let me examine execution times, node performance, and resource usage to provide optimization recommendations.
